javax.vecmath

Class Color4f

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.vecmath.Tuple4f
      • javax.vecmath.Color4f
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class Color4f
extends Tuple4f
implements java.io.Serializable
    A 4 element color represented by single precision floating point x,y,z,w coordinates. Color and alpha components should be in the range of zero to one.
    Version:
    specification 1.2, implementation 1.0 $Revision$, $Date$
    Author:
    Kenji hiranabe
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
